Source Ultimate Magic pg. 162

When a character gains the ability to cast spells from a class, he must decide whether to become a wordcaster or a normal spellcaster in that class. Once made, this choice cannot be changed. A character who elects to be a wordcaster in a spellcasting class typically cannot use the spells of that class (though the Experimental Spellcaster feat allows a spellcaster to learn and use a limited number of words of power), but he can utilize spell trigger and spell completion items just as if he were an ordinary spellcaster of that class.
